TopicTitle: idk where to post this rly

Articles.Content: is ther a crew loader like the stairs u get at airports when boarding a plane ik we can load crew from the sph and vab but im doing a cinematic and dont rly know how to build one that works
I think your best bet would be to build a ramp rather than stairs.
Stairs used to be a model with steps, but it had a sloped physics model. So ramps are probably your best bet.

You are better off to build a cannon using a Mainsail pointing towards the Cockpit or pod the kerbal has to go into.

Nobody will use stairs if you can take the Rocket-Elevator
FASA launch-towers allow that, IIRC. Never used it myself but I think the crew start in the command-pods so you have to EVA them onto the tower and then walk them back.
